node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 28 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and developed symptoms on July 28.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 缸瓦甫警察訓練中心地盤
groups.name_en: Kong Nga Po Police Training Centre Construction Site
groups.description_zh: 缸瓦甫警察訓練中心地盤位於新屋嶺警察拘留中心附近。染疫的工人主要受聘於土地勘探或土地平整工作的分包商。
groups.description_en: The Kong Nga Po Police Training Centre Construction Site is situated near the San Uk Ling Holding Centre. The contracted construction workers diagnosed for the virus are mainly responsible for land surveying and levelling.

node.location_en: Boon Yuet House, Choi Wan (I) Estate
